strapiPost.title: Maple Street Makeover
strapiPost.content:
The City of Fayetteville and the University of Arkansas are planning a $6.4m revamp of a six-block area of Maple St. between Garland Ave. and the Razorback Greenway.

  • Streetscape: After remaining in the planning stages for several years, local leaders submitted the project plans to the USDOT for financial aid.
  • Long street short: The plans include solving several safety concerns by expanding the sidewalks and adding a bike lane that runs parallel to Maple St., linking campus to the greenway.

You can read the full Maple St. Grant Application HERE.
